body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug

**What happened**:
Four medium-scale e2e performance test runs failed recently due to errors such as the following:
```
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/framework/framework.go:135
Expected error:
    <*errors.errorString | 0xc42fa524e0>: {
        s: "Container kube-apiserver-e2e-scalability-master/kube-apiserver is using 1506.86328125/1500 MB of memory",
    }
    Container kube-apiserver-e2e-scalability-master/kube-apiserver is using 1506.86328125/1500 MB of memory
not to have occurred
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/framework/framework.go:365
```

- https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-scalability/8046
- https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-scalability/8059

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a consistently or frequently failing test.
labels.name: kind/failing-test

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Scalability.
labels.name: sig/scalability

title: apiserver memory usage increased by 10-20% after addition of admission metrics
